description.@en: You much prefer the solitude of nature and creatures of the wilds than the cries and clamor of the big city. As a consequence, youâ€™ve developed an aptitude to not only spot wild animals on the loose, but also to calm angry beasts when they act out of sorts.

effect.@en: When you fail an Awareness or Handle Animal Test, you may re-roll to generate a better result, but must accept the outcome.
